sentences.sentence: You can get tutoring in a lot of subjects.
sentences.translation: 你可以在很多科目上得到辅导。

sentences.sentence: Now I want to start doing tutoring work independently.
sentences.translation: 现在我想开始独立做辅导工作。

sentences.sentence: I have been working at the campus tutoring center as a math tutor.
sentences.translation: 我一直在校园辅导中心做数学家教。
